en.title: **Intermediate**
en.text:
Completed Intermediate education with a focus on the MPC stream (Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry), covering essential analytical and scientific foundations such as:

  • Calculus and Algebra
  • Mechanics and Electromagnetism
  • Chemical Reactions and Thermodynamics

Built a strong problem-solving mindset and quantitative reasoning skills, forming the backbone for a successful transition into Computer Science.

en.title: **Secondary School** Certificate (SSC)
en.text: Completed Secondary School Certificate (SSC) with a strong academic foundation in core subjects such as Mathematics, Science, and English. Developed discipline, communication skills, and a curiosity-driven approach to learning that laid the groundwork for higher education.

en.title: **Bachelor** of Technology
en.info: CSI Wesley Institute of Technology and Sciences
en.text:
Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science with a solid academic foundation in core computing concepts, including:

  • Data Structures and Algorithms
  • Operating Systems
  • Database Management Systems
  • Computer Networks

Blending theoretical knowledge with hands-on projects and internships to build real-world software solutions and develop a future-ready skillset.
